articles.description: World number one Aryna Sabalenka takes on fifth seed Elena Rybakina in a big-hitting Australian Open final - follow live.
articles.title: Australian Open final 2025 LIVE: Aryna Sabalenka vs Elena Rybakina - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: Leeds striker Dominic Calvert-Lewin sits down with BBC Sport's Betty Glover to talk about his return to goalscoring form, being a free agent and his England chances.
articles.title: Dominic Calvert-Lewin: Leeds striker eyes England return

articles.description: England white-ball captain Harry Brook says other players were present when he was involved in an altercation with a nightclub bouncer.
articles.title: Harry Brook: England one-day skipper admits other players were present during nightclub bouncer altercation

articles.description: Rapper Snoop Dogg says he wants to play his part in making Swansea City become a "global name".
articles.title: West Coast rapper Snoop Dogg aims to make Swansea City a 'global name'

articles.description: Luka Doncic scores a triple double in 20 first-half minutes as the Los Angeles Lakers thrash the Washington Wizards 142-111 on Friday.
articles.title: Luka Doncic hits triple double in only 20 minutes as LA Lakers hammer Wizards

articles.description: Florian Wirtz sits down with Kelly Somers to talk about his slow start at Anfield, playing padel and making Bundesliga history.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz: Liverpool attacking midfielder in his own words

articles.description: British light-middleweight Josh Kelly tells BBC Sport about how he won his battle with chronic hypochondria to emerge as a world title contender.
articles.title: Murtazaliev vs Kelly: How Briton Josh Kelly overcame hypochondria to earn world title shot

articles.description: Sam Curran takes England's second ever hat-trick in T20 internationals as they beat Sri Lanka by 11 runs (DLS) in Pallekele.
articles.title: Sam Curran: England seamer takes hat-trick as tourists win first T20

articles.description: England's Justin Rose shoots a seven-under-par 65 to extend his lead to four shots at the Farmers Insurance Open while returning Brooks Koepka made the cut.
articles.title: Justin Rose maintains leads as Brooks Koepka makes cut in PGA Tour return at Farmers Insurance Open

articles.description: A slow-burning Australian Open looks set for a final weekend flourish after Novak Djokovic takes the limelight once again in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Novak Djokovic steals show in Melbourne after Carlos Alcaraz denies bending rules
